name: Performapal Kaleidoscorp
text:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
All LIGHT monsters you control gain 300 ATK.

[ Monster Effect ] 
Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; this turn, it can attack all Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls, once each.
pendulum_text: All LIGHT monsters you control gain 300 ATK.
